transcripts.text: So right now, we are heading to this guy's house for the sting operation with DSI and the local police.  He has been distributing child pornography over the internet to his over 14,000 members.  This guy has children in the house.
Okay, you can go.  That's the house.

From this little corner in this little border town between Thailand and Cambodia, right here, this little station, this guy has wreaked havoc, has terrorized children, 14,000 subscribers.  Do you know what kind of demand that is, which produces the supply, which is children?  You know how many children have been abused so that this little operation can go forward?  It's incredible.  Excellent work to the OER operators.
I'm here saying that we would like to thank OER for helping with the investigation.  The case actually came from OER, so thank you.
